# startAngle

**Instance Property**

An angle that begins the curve.

## Declaration

```swift
var startAngle: Measurement<UnitAngle> { get }
```

## Measuring a curve

- **endAngle**: The angle at the end of the curve.
- **radius**: The radius of the curve.
